definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: They have retrained a number of young technicians for our factory.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲我廠再培訓了一些年輕的技術員。

sentences.english: Yes. A specific subject-selection system allows the training coordinator to select relevant subjects for each target group.
sentences.chinese: 可以根據每一個目標羣設定相關的培訓主題。

sentences.english: In the beginning the training sessions were held at Volvo Trucks dealerships on Saturdays.
sentences.chinese: 最初的培訓課程由沃爾沃卡車公司安排在週日進行。

sentences.english: it was actually the management training that the company provided. That was the bigger draw.
sentences.chinese: 但它提供了一個管理培訓項目的這一點更加吸引我。

sentences.english: The system consists of models of well control equipment and computer control system.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種用於井控培訓教學的計算機仿真系統。

sentences.english: The resources of the private sector will also be harnessed by incentivising training through an outcome - based approach.
sentences.chinese: 私營部門的資源也要通過培訓的收入被激勵和利用。

sentences.english: Second, I suggest you to take an additional course in some training center.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我建議你去培訓中心上額外的課程。

sentences.english: They will be provided training both at government institutes and in-house training school.
sentences.chinese: 他們將提供培訓，同時在政府機構和內部培訓學校。

sentences.english: They will be provided training both at government institutes and in-house training school.
sentences.chinese: 他們將提供培訓，同時在政府機構和內部培訓學校。

sentences.english: Laser battle is fashionably military sport integrated with entertainment and training.
sentences.chinese: 雷戰是一種集娛樂和培訓於一身的時尚軍事體育運動。

sentences.english: They are concerned with the training curriculum, but not the details of each course.
sentences.chinese: 他們參與培訓課程，但是並不關心每一門課程的細節。

sentences.english: Attendance will be recorded on the Training attendance register.
sentences.chinese: 出勤情況將記錄在培訓出勤登記薄上。

sentences.english: That class increased her accomplishments as a pianist.
sentences.chinese: 那個培訓班增長了她作爲鋼琴師的技藝。

sentences.english: And it's not enough to just depend on books in the proccess of learning.
sentences.chinese: 對於其學習過程僅僅依靠書本及培訓是遠遠不夠的。

sentences.english: To organize the new Employee's training&assement for quality skill related.
sentences.chinese: 協調有關新員工質量基本技能的培訓和評價。

sentences.english: Responsible for archive training for the related department.
sentences.chinese: 負責對各部門相關檔案管理人員進行業務培訓。

definition: student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
